document_data.name: Borzz
document_data.mainbody:
'''Stompin' Borzz the Ratcatcher''' was a pest exterminator from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''Small rats, big rats, giant rats, rabid rats, any kind of rats, Borzz stomps them all! Reasonable rates, corpses, and rat pellets removed at no extra charge.''|Stompin' Borzz the Ratcatcher}}
document_data.History: Borzz advertised his exterminator services to the folk of the Lower City via notice board postings. One note was placed on the board across from the [[Basilisk Gate]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}. The advertisement claimed Borzz was highly proficient in stompin' [[rat]]s of all sizes, including [[giant rat]]s, but offered rat droppings and corpse disposal for an additional fee. Borzz the Ratcatcher offered referrals upon request.
